title: Picturestart
short: This inspirational brutalist website was built by Stink Studios.
body: Built by the US-based [Stink Studios](https://www.stinkstudios.com/), this site has a definite brutalist aesthetic. Featuring a flat design and contrast of color, clever use of video & gesture-driven animations. > PICTURESTART is a media company that makes content for worldwide engagement, telling diverse stories with diverse creatives in film, television and digital productions. [Check it out](https://www.picturestart.com/)! ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites (April 2020)](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
